Des_Plaines.Rosemont station (Metra): Rosemont is a station on Metra's North Central Service in Rosemont, Illinois. The station is 18.6 miles (29.9 km) away from Union Station, the southern terminus of the line. In Metra's zone-based fare system, Rosemont is in zone D. Rosemont was opened on January 30, 2006 along with three other new stations on the North Central Service.
